meanings.definition: A person who administers or manages something.
meanings.sent1: The administrant of the office ensured all tasks were completed on time.
meanings.sent2: The hospital administrant oversaw the daily operations of the medical facility.
meanings.sent3: The administrant of the school accidentally locked themselves out of the principal's office.
meanings.sent4: As the administrant of the team, she orchestrated the players like a skilled conductor.
meanings.sent5: The diligent administrant meticulously organized the files for easy access.

meanings.sent1: The administrant duties included scheduling meetings and managing budgets.
meanings.sent2: The administrant staff worked tirelessly to keep the office running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The administrant paperwork seemed never-ending, but it was crucial for the company's success.
meanings.sent4: Her administrant skills shone through as she efficiently coordinated the project.
meanings.sent5: The administrant processes were streamlined to improve efficiency in the department.
